en-US.freeTrialWelcome: Hit movies and bold series, all in one place. Claim your special offer now. Cancel anytime.
en-US.signUpHeadline: Enter an Email and Claim Your Special Offer
en-US.signUpBody: Limited time offer. Offer available to new and previous twlght App subscribers who re-subscribe via twlght.com. Offer does not include free trial. After completion of offer, service automatically rolls to month-to-month at the then current price unless cancelled. Subscription fee is non-refundable.

en-US.signUpBodyRenew: Your subscription has been canceled or has lapsed. To continue enjoying all of the bold original series and hit movies, please update your payment info.
